sentence.Network_en: He has plenty of joie de vivre.
sentence.Network_cn: 他尽情享受生活的乐趣。

sentence.Network_en: After the depressing events of the last few months, Mina felt that it was time to put a little joie de vivre back into their lives.
sentence.Network_cn: 经历了前几个月许多令人沮丧的事情, 麦娜觉得现在该小小地享受一下生活了.

sentence.Network_en: He was admired for his savoir - vivre and entertaining anecdotes.
sentence.Network_cn: 他因精通人情世故及善于讲有趣的轶事而被人仰慕.
